description: Data was generated from the final CGHub Manifest prior to the transition of all data to the Genomic Data Commons in June 2016. More details: https://docs.gdc.cancer.gov/Encyclopedia/pages/Cancer_Genomics_Hub/

fields.description: Study for which the data was generated, e.g. TCGA, TARGET, etc
fields.name: study

fields.description: Aliquot barcode
fields.name: barcode

fields.description: TCGA disease code e.g. OV, GBM
fields.name: disease

fields.description: Disease name e.g. GLIOBLASTOMA MULTIFORME
fields.name: disease_name

fields.description: Two-digit sample_type code which forms part of the sample barcode e.g. 01,11,06, etc.
fields.name: sample_type

fields.description: The longer name of the sample type; e.g. Primary Tumor, Recurrent Tumor, etc.
fields.name: sample_type_name

fields.description: Substrate type e.g. DNA,  RNA
fields.name: analyte_type

fields.description: Experimental strategy used to generate library e.g. WGS, WXS
fields.name: library_type

fields.description: Center name, eg BCM, BI, WUGSC
fields.name: center

fields.description: Platform used to generate data (null, Illumina)
fields.name: platform

fields.description: Abbreviated name of the platform technology used to generate the data, e.g. Illumina
fields.name: platform_name

fields.description: The reference assembly to which the nucleotide sequence of a case can be aligned. In this table, there are 17 reference assemblies represented (NCBI36_WUGSC_variant, HG18_Broad_variant, NCBI36_BCM_variant,HG19_Broad_variant, GRCh37-lite,NCBI36_BCCAGSC_variant, HG18, HG19, GRCh37, GRCh37_BI_Variant,GRCh37-lite-+-HPV_Redux-build, unaligned,HS37D5,GRCh37-lite_WUGSC_variant_1,GRCh37-lite_WUGSC_variant_2,NCBI-human-build36,hs37d5-buildplusVirus_plusHLAalternate_normalized. Null is input where no available for assembly.
fields.name: assembly

fields.description: Original file name for the underlying bam file
fields.name: filename

fields.description: The size of a file measured in bytes (B), kilobytes (KB), megabytes (MB), gigabytes (GB), terabytes (TB), and larger values.
fields.name: file_size

fields.description: Md5 checksume for file
fields.name: checksum

fields.description: CGHub_analysis_id
fields.name: analysis_id

fields.description: NULL
fields.name: aliquot_id

fields.description: CGHub unique case identifier; maps to case in GDC data portal
fields.name: participant_id

fields.description: CGHub unique sample identifier; maps to sample in GDC data portal
fields.name: sample_id

fields.description: Tissue Source ID. Biospecimens consisting of Tumor and Normal tissue samples and clinical metadata are collected from patients donors at various Tissue Source Sites (TSS). Each TSS is identified by its unique TSS ID.
fields.name: tss_id

fields.description: SRA database sample assession number, e.g. SRS004142
fields.name: sample_accession

fields.description: Date the file was published. e.g. 2010-10-21
fields.name: published

fields.description: Date uploaded to CGHub
fields.name: uploaded

fields.description: Date file modified e.g. 2015-02-20
fields.name: modified

fields.description: File state -- either submitted or released
fields.name: state

fields.description: Sample type code. See link for the more details: https://gdc.cancer.gov/resources-TCGA-users/TCGA-code-tables/sample-type-codes
fields.name: sample_type_code

fields.description: Abbreviation of substrate type e.g D for DNA, R for RNA
fields.name: analyte_type_code

fields.description: Full name of the platform techonlogy used to generate the data e.g. Illumina Genome Analyzer II
fields.name: platform_full_name

fields.description: File Type  -- eg aligned_reads , simple_somatic_mutation , gene_expression , etc
fields.name: file_type

fields.description: Issues with files are denoted here if available. E.g. internal error or null
fields.name: reason

fields.description: Name of vendor of the reagents used to generate data, e.g. Agilent
fields.name: reagent_vendor

fields.description: Name of reagent used to generate data, e.g. TCGA_6K, Custom V2 Exome Bait, 48 RXN X 16 tubes|Custom V2 Exome Bait, 48 RXN X 16 tubes
fields.name: reagent_name

fields.description: Vendor's reagent catalog number -- Exome Capture Kit Information
fields.name: catalog_number

fields.description: Yes, No if file is custom. Null where no data available.
fields.name: is_custom

fields.description: Path of target file
fields.name: target_file_url

fields.description: Deprecated BitBucket paths to probe files e.g. https://bitbucket.org/cghub/cghub-capture-kit-info/raw/d8b126dd4f33eb7164535e00f0ec9a5985056f34/BI/vendor/Agilent/cancer_2000gene_shift170.baitIntervals.bed|https://bitbucket.org/cghub/cghub-capture-kit-info/raw/d8b126dd4f33eb7164535e00f0ec9a5985056f34/BI/vendor/Agilent/TCGA_6k_genes.baitIntervals.bed
fields.name: probe_file_url
